overview: Shot in Super 8 Ektachrome using the codes of experimental cinema, this film evokes the four stages a person undergoes when having a tonic-clonic seizure, one of the most violent experiences the body inflicts on itself. This internal voyage is unconscious for the most part, and very little memories remain. However, waking up from a seizure still reeks of trauma, as scattered parts of the brain and the body try to recover.
title: This Little Light of Mine
